name: Dr.Kroll
tag_list: ventura-dentist, ventura-general-dentist, ventura-cosmetic-dentist, ventura-family-dentist, ventura-implant-dentist, ventura-invisalign-dentist, ventura-veneers, dentist-in-ventura, general-dentist-in-ventura, cosmetic-dentist-in-ventura, family-dentist-i
overview:
Dr. Philip Kroll is a ventura dentist that provides general, cosmetic and implant dentistry in a high-tech advanced dental practice. Skilled in treating complex cosmetic and reconstructive dental cases, he is one of the most credentialed general dentists in Ventura, CA to provide implant surgery and prosthetics. ﻿ Dr. Kroll is well-known world wide for his expertise leader, gentleness, and kindness. He has been compassionately creating beautiful smiles in Ventura County for more than 25 years. Dr. Kroll often travels the world to lecture and speak in high profile dental events. He is a ​Senior Instructor and Director of Occlusion at the UCLA Center For Esthetic Dentistry.

Postdoctorate Dental Educational Awards and Associations 2011 - present • Trustee, American Academy of Implant Dentistry. • Chairman, Education Committee American Academy of Implant Dentistry. ﻿ 2010
• Fellow, American Academy of Implant Dentistry, awarded to less than 300 dentists in the world. ​ 2010 - 2011
• President, American Academy of Implant Dentistry, Western US.

2009 - 2010
• Scientific Chairman and Speaker for Esthetics and Implantology Meeting Los Angeles, CA. ​ 2007 - present • Director of Occlusion UCLA Center for Esthetic Dentistry. • Sr. Instructor UCLA Dept. of Restorative Dentistry
​ 2007
• The prestigious Mastership Award in the Academy of General Dentistry, achieved by less than 1 percent of all dentists. Awarded on board the USS Midway in San Diego, California, on June 30, 2007. ​ 2007 - present • Clinical instructor at UCLA Center for Esthetic Dentistry. Dr. Kroll teaches licensed dentists skills in cosmetic dentistry and oral reconstruction. ​ 2006
• Board of Directors, Western District American Academy of Implant Dentistry. ​ 2004
• Associate Fellow of the American Academy of Implant Dentistry. This is a recognized credential from the oldest and most prestigious dental implant academy in the world. ​ 2001
• Fellow of the Academy of General Dentistry, awarded to less than 5 percent of all dentists. ​ 1990 - 1996 • Local Regional Director, California Dental Association. ​ 1986
• Outstanding proficiency in the treatment of the geriatric patient awarded to Dr. Kroll upon graduation from Ostrow School of Dentistry of USC. ﻿ ﻿Dental Service Awards • Voted one of America’s Top Dentists in Implant and Cosmetic Dentistry by the Consumers’ Research Council of America. • Voted the Ventura County Star Reader’s Choice award for Best Dentist for several years. ​ ​Additional Dental Study Dr. Kroll has earned certificates in the following: • Mini Residency in Implant Prosthodontics • Ventura-Santa Barbara Implant Study Club • Occlusion, Diagnosis and Esthetics, UCLA • Advanced Studies in Surgical Implants, Periodontics and Esthetic Analysis, UCLA • Cosmetic Dentistry Continuum, UCLA • St. John’s Implant Study Club • USC Odontic Seminar • Loma Linda University Implantology Study Program • Dr. Kroll has put on dental meetings for teaching implant and cosmetic dentistry for UCLA and the American Academy of Implant Dentistry (AAID).

Dental Memberships​ • International Congress of Oral Implantologists (ICOI) • American Academy of Implant Dentistry (AAID) • American Academy of Cosmetic Dentistry (AACD) • Academy of Laser Dentistry (ALD) • American Dental Association (ADA) • American Society of Osseointegration (AO) • American Equilibration Society (AES) • Academy of General Dentistry (AGD) • Academy of Laser Dentistry (ALD) • California Dental Association (CDA) • Santa Barbara/Ventura County Dental Society (Past Area Director) • Santa Barbara/Ventura County Implant Study Club • American Cancer Society (Past Board Member)
